Rowdy Wolf:






Rowdy Wolf growled at Striker. He kept his rifle aimed at Striker's head. 
"What's wrong with being Predacon?" he said coldly. He had never used that 
tone of voice, but Quickstrike had told him of the dangers of Maximals. "Who 
are you?"
